---305018135-1438852760-1060216326=:8595
Content-Type: TEXT/PLAIN; charset=US-ASCII


Today I checked into cvs a new test garden that should make automated
testing a whole lot easier.  I've attached a readme.txt that explains how
the tools work and what's available.  You should be able to check out this
code from anywhere and use it witout modification (tests will let you know
if/when this is not the case).

To see it in action check out:

  http://crawl08.archive.org/

For a file manifest:

  http://crawl08.archive.org/?links=1

Note: You may run any/all of the reporting scripts locally (results.cgi
and testreport.pl) even if the garden is remote, though they fetch
configuration information real-time based on the log files being parsed,
so you will need an internet connection when evaluating test results.

Let me know if you have any questions,

pt.
-- 
Parker Thompson
The Internet Archive
510.541.0125
